pages.text: Secondary materials give unique looks and some additional bonuses to tool part. Secondary materials increase the properties of tool parts, and can increase the mining level.

pages.title: Secondary upgrades
pages.item: forgero:iron-pickaxehead{Head:{PrimaryMaterial:'iron', SecondaryMaterial:'netherite', ToolPartType:'Head', ToolPartHeadType:'PICKAXE', Gem:'1-empty-gem', ToolPartIdentifier:'iron-pickaxehead', Schematic:'pickaxe-schematic'}}
pages.text: This iron pickaxe head has been upgraded with an netherite ingot in the Smithing table. Every single tool parts can be upgraded with a secondary material.

pages.title: Gem upgrades
pages.item: forgero:iron-pickaxehead{Head:{PrimaryMaterial:'iron', SecondaryMaterial:'netherite', ToolPartType:'Head', ToolPartHeadType:'PICKAXE', Gem:'7-lapis-gem', ToolPartIdentifier:'iron-pickaxehead', Schematic:'pickaxe-schematic'}}
pages.text: This iron pickaxe head has been upgraded with an level 7 Lapis Gem in the Smithing table. A single gem can be placed on every tool part. Higher level gems will multiply their effect with the gem's level.

pages.title: Gem upgrades
pages.text: This acacia handle has been upgraded with an level 3 Emerald Gem in the Smithing table. A single gem can be placed on every tool part. Higher level gems will multiply their effect with the gem's level.
